tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SQL_Injection_Monitoring (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    query VARCHAR(255),
    detected_at TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE sql_injection_logs (
    id int PRIMARY KEY,
    query_text varchar,
    detected_timestamp timestamp
)

CREATE TABLE injection_patterns (
    pattern_id int PRIMARY KEY,
    pattern_text varchar
)

CREATE TABLE detected_attacks (
    attack_id int PRIMARY KEY,
    attack_type varchar,
    detection_timestamp timestamp
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    password VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    action VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE queries (
    query_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    query_text TEXT,
    user_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE whitelist (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    query_text TEXT,
    added_by VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE blacklist (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    query_text TEXT,
    added_by VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
